title: The Conviction & Subsequent Life of Savior Neck
description: Answers for the final time the following age-old questions : 1. why do small town cops bungle a murder investigation with evidence in abundance? 2. what is the relation of the author to the protagonist and why must we even ask this silly question? 3. what are the names and associations of the river that flows through the center of small town america with such polluted grace?
author: Christian TeBordo
